    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client​(java.lang.String serverName,
              int serverPort,
              ClientConnectionHandle clientInitialised,
              ClientDisconnectedHandle clientClosedHandle)
        The default constructor
        Parameters:
        serverName - The hostname of the socket server
        serverPort - The port of the socket server
        clientInitialised - Handle that fires when client finishes initialising and receives clientID
        clientClosedHandle - Handle that fires when client disconnects from the server for any reason

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send​(DataCarrier data)
          throws java.lang.SecurityException
        Send a message to the server
        Parameters:
        data - The data to be sent
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - Thrown when a messageName that is used by the library or is blacklisted for any other reason is passed to be sent
        See Also:
        DataCarrier

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast​(java.lang.String name,
                      Message data)
        Broadcast a message to all connected clients
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the message
        data - The data to be sent
